release_note_en_us:
- IOS security zone adjustment
- Repair job description is not displayed
- Optimized job review logic
- Fixed the problem that the default avatar was not displayed on the answering result page and the scoring page
- Fix the interactive list, the students clicked and did not respond
- Optimized the prompt information of interactive teaching materials
- QR code sign-in failure page optimization
- UI optimization
release_note_zh_hans:
- IOS安全区域调整
- 修复作业描述不显示
- 作业批改逻辑优化
- 修复抢答结果页和评分页面不显示默认头像
- 修复互动列表，学生点击抢答无响应
- 互动教材播放提示信息优化
- 二维码签到失败页面优化
- UI优化
release_note_zh_hant:
- IOS安全區域調整
- 修復作業描述不顯示問題
- 作業批改邏輯優化
- 修復搶答結果頁和評分頁面不顯示默認頭像問題
- 修復互動列表，學生點擊搶答無反應問題
- 互動教材播放提示文案優化
- QR Code簽到失敗頁面優化
- UI優化
